description: OperatorSpec contains common fields for an operator to need.  It is intended to be anonymous included inside of the Spec struct for you particular operator.

imagePullPolicy.description: imagePullPolicy specifies the image pull policy. One of Always, Never, IfNotPresent. Defaults to Always if :latest tag is specified, or IfNotPresent otherwise.

imagePullSpec.description: imagePullSpec is the image to use for the component.

logging.description: LoggingConfig holds information about configuring logging

managementState.description: managementState indicates whether and how the operator should manage the component

version.description: version is the desired state in major.minor.micro-patch.  Usually patch is ignored.
